mapper.select: SELECT EZC_MEM.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MEM.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MEM.USER_KEY AS userKey /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MEM.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MEM.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MEM.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MEM.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MEM /* 회원 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MEM.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MEM.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_MEM_PK(P),SYS_C0011467(C) */ AND EZC_MEM.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), FK_EZC_CLIENT_INFO_EZC_MEM(R),SYS_C0011468(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_MEM /* 회원 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MEM.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD
AND EZC_MEM.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MEM.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MEM.USER_KEY = #{userKey, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MEM.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MEM.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MEM.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MEM.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_MEM.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MEM.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MEM.USER_KEY AS userKey /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MEM.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MEM.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MEM.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MEM.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MEM /* 회원 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MEM.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD
AND EZC_MEM.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MEM.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MEM.USER_KEY = #{userKey, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MEM.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MEM.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MEM.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MEM.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_MEM.USER_ID DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_MEM SET /* 회원 정보 */ USER_KEY = #{userKey, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_MEM /* 회원 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
